summary: A woman stuck in a stale marriage struggles to raise her children and manage her secret drug habit. But when winter comes to her small town, her balancing act begins to come crashing down.
cast: Vera Farmiga|Hugh Dillon|Clint Jordan|Caridad 'La Bruja' De La Luz|Jasper Daniels|Taylor Foxhall|Giles Penderghast|Terry McKenna|Richard Lieske|Hector Vasquez|Joel Saeks|Lori Berryman|Walt Bolde|Edward Crawford|Gia Mitchell|Anthony Ricci|Liam Underhill|Kira Daniels|Charles Broughton|Ernest Longyear|Robert Henderson|Jackie Lieske|Alan Samulski|Matthew Goldpaugh|Nancy Juvonen|Kenneth Thompson|Corinne Stralka|Randy Conti|Patrick Dowling|George Koch|Jadira|Vinny Ritchie|Tom Brangle|Gary Thompson|Jeremiah Flaherty|Melissa Ortquist|Karen Keefe|Tillie Olinsky|Shelley Bolding|Honey|Joe James|Phillip X Levine|Stephen W. Tenner
title: Down to the Bone
